LanguageData.xpMultiplier_desc: XP Multiplier that is applied to all XP gains when the Pawn is below his maximum achieved level. Depending on the setting will be also multiplied by the number of skill levels that Pawn has lost.
LanguageData.multiplicationChancePerXpGainTick_desc: Chance that the XP will be multiplied by the mod for each XP gain tick when bellow maximum level.
LanguageData.enumXpMultiplierType_desc: Dictates whether XP multiplier is dependent on level difference between current level and maximum achieved level or is fixed to a specific multiplier.
